EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry we missed you at our webinar, Innovate Through Extreme Automation with voke, inc.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://www.tricentis.com/resources/webcasts>
<http://www.tricentis.com/resources/webcasts>
Analyst Webinar: Innovate Through Extreme Automation
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
We’re sorry we missed you at our webinar, “Innovate through Extreme Automation.” Theresa Lanowitz of voke, inc. and Wolfgang Platz of Tricentis discussed extreme automation as a solution to the problems confronting Global 2000 companies. Questions from our audience provided further insight and made for a very interesting hour.
Want to see what you missed? Watch the recording here. <http://www.tricentis.com/resources/webcasts> Thanks,
The Tricentis Team
<http://www.tricentis.com/resources/webcasts> Theresa Lanowitz
Founder, voke, inc. <http://www.tricentis.com/resources/webcasts>
Wolfgang Platz
Founder & Chief Product Officer, Tricentis
